Interface SALearningAgentFactoryForSG


  • public interface SALearningAgentFactoryForSG

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LearningAgent generateAgentForRLDomain(Domain domain, RewardFunction rf, TerminalFunction tf)
      Returns a BURLAP learning agent for the given RLGlue generated domain, discount, reward function, and terminal function.

    • Method Detail

      • generateAgentForRLDomain

        LearningAgent generateAgentForRLDomain(Domain domain,
                                     RewardFunction rf,
                                     TerminalFunction tf)
        Returns a BURLAP learning agent for the given RLGlue generated domain, discount, reward function, and terminal function.
        Parameters:
        domain - a BURALP domain that wraps the RLGlue environment and task
        rf - the RLGlue specified reward function
        tf - the RLGlue specified terminal function
        Returns:
        a BURLAP learning agent
